title: In vitro and in vivo antibacterial activity of selected essential oil components against Pectobacterium carotovorum subsp. carotovorum and Pectobacterium atrosepticum causing bacterial soft rot of potato tubers

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 11
